text.div:
Argonaut Condition Category Codes

This value set includes codes from the http://hl7.org/fhir/condition-category code system and the Argonaut Project extension codes 'problems' and 'health-concerns'.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/condition-category
  • Include these codes as defined in http://argonaut.hl7.org
    CodeDisplay
    problemProblem
    health-concernHealth Concern

name: Argonaut Condition Category Codes
description: This value set includes codes from the  http://hl7.org/fhir/condition-category code system and  the  Argonaut Project extension codes  'problems' and 'health-concerns'.
purpose: Codes that are needed for implementation of the Argonaut Project Problem and Health Concern IGs.
